title: [LOGLAB-13] The strategy does not pause when the deviation of sizeDeltaInTokens exceeds the threshold
summary: The reported bug is in the function `BasisStrategy._afterDecreasePosition()`, which is used to determine if the strategy should pause after decreasing the hedge position. The function checks for deviations in two parameters, `sizeDeltaInTokens` and `collateralDeltaAmount`, and sets a boolean value, `shouldPause`, accordingly. However, there is a mistake in the code for `collateralDeltaAmount` where `shouldPause` is incorrectly set, overwriting the correct value set for `sizeDeltaInTokens`. This means that the strategy will not pause even when the `sizeDeltaInTokens` deviation exceeds the threshold. The suggested fix is to modify the code to `shouldPause = shouldPause | exceedsThreshold`. The bug has been fixed.
